Automation

Simplify cloud management with process automation

1RMB Trial Buy now

With Automation, you can save time, reduce errors, and increase efficiency, while lowering your operational costs. Automate all of your frequent, time-consuming, and error-prone cloud management tasks to free up more time for work that adds business value.

Automation runbooks can handle websites, Virtual Machines, Storage, SQL Server, and other popular Azure services. You can also use them to connect and manage any service that has a public Internet API.

Pricing Details

Process automation is charged by job runtime. You will only be charged for the number of minutes/hours that exceed the free unit allowance.

*The following prices are tax-inclusive.

*Monthly pricing estimates are based on 744 hours of usage per month.

FAQ

Expand all
  • How is it billed?

    We provide you with the service for free. For automation, we bill you based on the total number of minutes of job runtime used by all Automation accounts associated with your subscription. For example, using 5,500 minutes in one month will result in a charge of ￥50.

  • Which free units are included each month?

    Included free units are units available for you to use at no charge and are refreshed every month. All usage charges for the free units for each month are charged at the standard pricing rates. These free units are not available to subscribers using rate plans providing a flat discount or a fixed monthly credit amount.

Support & SLA

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support to select self-service or any other method to contact us for support.

We guarantee that at least 99.9% of jobs will begin within 30 minutes of the scheduled start time.

No Service Level Agreement is offered for the Free tier of Automation.

If you want to learn more about the details of our server level agreement, please visit the Service Level Agreement page.

TextpageLeftNav.metaDescription: Learn more about the pricing details for Azure Automation. Azure Automation is offered in two tiers: Free and Basic. The Basic tier of Azure Automation is billed on the basis of the number of minutes of job runtime used during a month. A 1RMB Trial gets you RMB1,500 in service credits. You can also make a direct purchase and become a Pay-in-Advance Azure customer to enjoy an up to 99.99% Service Level Agreement.
